wtlive.title: WarThunder Live
wtlive.description: Official community of War Thunder, where players can share their game screenshots, videos, skins, etc.

wtwiki.title: WarThunder Wiki
wtwiki.description: Official wiki of War Thunder, containing various information about the game, such as vehicle performance data, tactical skills, etc.

wtforum.title: WarThunder Forum
wtforum.description: Official forum of War Thunder, where players can exchange game experience, make suggestions, etc.

wtliker.title: WT Skins (CN)
wtliker.description: For War Thunder players to create, research, exchange and share custom content such as skins and voice packs.

wtdata.title: WT Heat Map
wtdata.description: WarThunder room heat map/trend map, you can view the heat map and trend map of the game.

local8111.title: Localhost 8111
local8111.description: WarThunder 8111 port data, showing real-time game information and some real-time data of vehicles. Only content when the game is open.

wtwiki_cn.title: WT Wiki (CN)
wtwiki_cn.description: Chinese War Thunder Wiki created by Chinese players, dedicated to building a Chinese wiki community with complete information and a harmonious atmosphere.

setting.auto_detected_wt_root_path_success: Auto detected WarThunder root path success!
setting.auto_detected_wt_setting_path_success: Auto detected WarThunder setting path success!

usage.title: Usage
usage.content1: This tool is a package for the open source unpacking tool wt_ext_cli. It aims to lower the threshold of unpacking and improve the ability of players to get first-hand game resources.
usage.content2: The current compatible version of wt_ext_cli is > v0.5.3, please contact the developer in case of incompatibility.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content1: We strongly recommend copying the game resource files to a new directory for unpacking while the game is closed to avoid damage to the game files during the unpacking process.
disclaimer.content2: Unpacking game resources is not a complicated job, but it requires you to have some knowledge. If you don't know how to use it properly, proceed with caution!

help.description: Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

unpack_dxp_and_grp.description: Unpacks folder and subfolder DXP and GRP files to text-formatted file
unpack_dxp_and_grp.output_dir_label: Target folder that will be created to contain new files, preserving file structure
unpack_dxp_and_grp.keep_suffix_label: Paths and Names inside the final DXP/GRP are always followed by "water_garbage_pile_b_tex_d$hq*" or random unicode chars "u+4575"

unpack_raw_blk.description: Unpacks a folder of raw/binary blk files into their unpacked format
unpack_raw_blk.input_dir_label: Folder containing blk files, sub-folders will be recursively searched
unpack_raw_blk.output_dir_label: Target folder that will be created to contain new files
unpack_raw_blk.format_label: Output format, can be one of: [Json, BlkText] [default: Json]

unpack_vromf.description: Unpacks vromf into raw or human readable formats, such as Json or Blk
unpack_vromf.input_file_label: A single vromf file, or a folder of Vromf files. Does not recurse subdirs
unpack_vromf.output_dir_label: Target folder that will be created to contain new files
unpack_vromf.format_label: Output format, can be one of: [Json, BlkText, Raw] [default: Json]
unpack_vromf.avif2png_label: Converts all avif images to png. Can be one of [imagemagick, ffmpeg] [default: imagemagick]
unpack_vromf.crlf_label: Returns files with \r\n instead of \n newlines
unpack_vromf.blk_extension_label: Replaces all blk files extension to this when provided, leaves them unchanged otherwise

vromf_version.description: Prints version(s) from file or folder of vromfs
vromf_version.input_file_label: A single vromf file, or a folder of Vromf files. Does not recurse subdirs

wt_skins.prepare_wt_root_path: Please configure the WarThunder root path first

usage.title: Usage
usage.content1: After downloading the user skin, you can use this tool to install it with one click. However, before using it, you need to go to the "Settings" page and configure the "War Thunder Root Path" so that the tool can manage your user skin correctly.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content1: This tool will only read and write to the UserSkins folder in the War Thunder game installation directory, which is officially provided by the game, so there is no risk of causing your game account to be banned by using this tool.
disclaimer.content2: The user should be responsible for the source and content of the user skins he/she installs. The tool and the author are not responsible for any problems caused by improper use by the user!

wt_skins.select_skin: Select the zip file or folder for user skin
wt_skins.select_skin_tip1: We supports the selection of user skin to be installed in two forms
wt_skins.select_skin_tip2: You can drag and drop the folder or zip directly onto the widget, or click the button below to select it manually.
wt_skins.select_skin_tip3: Compressed packages supported formats: zip, 7z (password compressed packages are not supported at this time)

empty_state.title: Unable to recognise the path
empty_state.content: Please check whether the "War Thunder Root Path" in "Settings" is correctly configured.
empty_state.jump_to2: check that the configuration items are set correctly

dialog.tip1: You can't recover after deletion, sure you want to delete this user skin? We recommend that you take a backup before deleting

error.10002: Failed to get application log path
error.20000: Failed to auto-detect War Thunder game root directory
error.20001: Failed to auto-detect War Thunder game setting directory
